name: Tiky Ghost - New Adventer
description:
* For a long time go around and around a deserted place, Tiky Ghost is not along now. He found a new girlfriend and they make friends. Now they can travel forever.
Tiky ghost now not FA anymore

Finally, he have a new friend that will come with him forever.

Try new Couple Mode with Tiky Ghost new version - New Adventure in Ghost World. Each player have one side, and only touch on your side.

Connect with your love with Couple Mode.
